---
title: "Beatles' Live Performances Shiny App"
author: "Lance Bryant"
date: "June 16, 2015"
output: html_document
---

With this app you can explore the Beatles' live performances from August 1960 to 
August 1966. The features of this app include:

- An interactive map displaying the venues where the Beatles performed during 
the date range selected by the user.
- A searchable database consisting of every live performance during the date range
selected by the user that can be filtered by venue, city, and country. There is 
also a search bar that finds the entered term anywhere in the database.
- A clickable day column that takes the user to the Beatles Bible website to learn
more about the venue and other Beatle-related events.
